text: Björn Rother (born 29 July 1996) is a German professional footballer who plays as defensive midfielder for F.C. Hansa Rostock. ==Career== In his youth, Rother played for TSV Hertha Walheim, Alemannia Aachen, and Bayer Leverkusen. In the summer of 2015 he moved from the U-19 of Leverkusen to the Werder Bremen reserves, playing in the 3. Liga. He made his debut on 5 September 2015, in the 1–3 defeat to Preußen Münster. He finished the 2016–17 season making 28 appearances and scoring one goal. On 2 June 2017, 3. Liga rivals 1. FC Magdeburg announced the signing of Rother on a two-year contract. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from Stolberg (Rhineland) Category:Footballers from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:German footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:SV Werder Bremen II players Category:1. title: Björn Rother
